original_query: What is the appropriate dose of levothyroxine for a 40yo female pt w/ Hashimoto's dx'd by Dr. Brown on 5th Nov 2020 at NY Presbyterian. contact email: dr.brown@ny.presbyterian.org
ground_truth_phi: NAME: Dr. Brown | GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION: NY Presbyterian | DATE: 5th Nov 2020 | EMAIL_ADDRESS: dr.brown@ny.presbyterian.org
system_prompt:
You are a HIPAA-compliant deidentification expert. Detect and redact ALL Protected Health Information (PHI).

HIPAA IDENTIFIERS (18 categories you MUST detect):
1. NAME - Patient, provider, family member names
2. GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION - Cities, states, hospitals, clinics, addresses, zip codes
3. DATE - Birth dates, admission/discharge dates, death dates, treatment dates (EXCEPT year alone)
4. PHONE_NUMBER - Telephone numbers, fax numbers
5. FAX_NUMBER - Fax numbers
6. EMAIL_ADDRESS - Email addresses
7. SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER - SSN or national ID
8. MEDICAL_RECORD_NUMBER - Medical record numbers, patient IDs
9. HEALTH_PLAN_BENEFICIARY_NUMBER - Insurance/plan numbers
10. ACCOUNT_NUMBER - Account numbers
11. CERTIFICATE_LICENSE_NUMBER - Certificate/license numbers
12. VEHICLE_IDENTIFIER - VIN, license plate numbers
13. DEVICE_IDENTIFIER - Device serial numbers
14. WEB_URL - Web URLs
15. IP_ADDRESS - IP addresses
16. BIOMETRIC_IDENTIFIER - Fingerprints, voice prints, retinal scans
17. PHOTO - Full-face photos or comparable images
18. UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER - Any other unique identifying number

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Replace each PHI with [REDACTED_TYPE] where TYPE is the category
- Be thorough - catch ALL identifiers
- Output ONLY the redacted text, no explanations
user_prompt:
Deidentify this clinical query:

What is the appropriate dose of levothyroxine for a 40yo female pt w/ Hashimoto's dx'd by Dr. Brown on 5th Nov 2020 at NY Presbyterian. contact email: dr.brown@ny.presbyterian.org

Output ONLY the redacted query with [REDACTED_TYPE] markers.
gpt4o_output: What is the appropriate dose of levothyroxine for a 40yo female pt w/ Hashimoto's dx'd by [REDACTED_NAME] on [REDACTED_DATE] at [REDACTED_GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION]. contact email: [REDACTED_EMAIL_ADDRESS]
